meta.note: Preset command lines sent to the TARGET UART (U-Boot / Linux).

fel.sunxi_version: echo Run on PC: sunxi-fel version
fel.sunxi_boot_ram: echo Run on PC: sunxi-fel -v spl u-boot-sunxi-with-spl.bin

warnings.large_write_warning: echo WARNING: This board may NOT tolerate large single writes. Use chunked writes + verify.
warnings.verify_hint: echo Always verify after writing. Prefer UMS (USB Mass Storage) when possible.
